snippet: As the fiscal impasse in Washington takes center stage, investors should brace for various possible outcomes — including the chance that the effects won’t be as dire as some people predict.
abstract: Paul J Lim Fundamentally column holds that as the fiscal impasse in Washington takes center stage, investors should brace for various possible outcomes--including the chance that the effects will not be as dire as some people predict; contends there is possibility that gridlock will eventually lead to major tax and spending reforms.
lead_paragraph: As the fiscal impasse in Washington takes center stage, investors should brace for various possible outcomes — including the chance that the effects won’t be as dire as some people predict.

headline.seo: Fiscal Impasse Now Takes Center Stage for Investors
